CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper April 9, 1960, pg. A2, reads: "Central Baptist Church Plays Host - NAACP Youth Rally Backs Dixie 'Sit-In' War - Singing for Freedom - Among those singing for freedom at the NAACP's youth rally at Central Baptist Church were, left photo, the Pittsburgh Folksingers. Left to right: Daniel Muss, Vivian Richman and David Bergholtz... - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Pittsburgh Folksingers members Daniel Muss on banjo, Vivian Richman on guitar, and David Bergholtz on guitar singing during NAACP Youth Rally in Central Baptist Church
